Interface Rule


  • public interface Rule
    All rules must implements this interface
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileModelItem apply(FileModelItem file)
      This method apply the rule to the filename

      Reset the internal state of the rule

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        FileModelItem apply(FileModelItem file)
        This method apply the rule to the filename
        Parameters:
        file - - the FileModelItem containing file to rename
        Returns:
        the input file with updated values, useful when use more rules in pipe

        void reset()
        Reset the internal state of the rule
